law.catch_line: An individual who, within the meaning of § 13-327 of this subtitle, has failed to file a campaign f...

text.section:
An individual who, within the meaning of § 13-327 of this subtitle, has failed to file a campaign finance report that is due from, or on behalf of, that individual, may not, until the individual corrects the failure to file:
be deemed to be elected to a public or party office in this State;
take the oath or otherwise assume the duties of the office; or
receive any salary or compensation for the office.

An official of the State or any of its political subdivisions may not issue a commission or administer an oath of office to an individual until that official receives certification from the State Board that all campaign finance reports due under § 13-304 of this subtitle from, or on behalf of, that individual have been filed.
